## EDH dataset
Source of data: <https://edh-www.adw.uni-heidelberg.de/data/export>, downloaded 20019-11-07
Github repository: <https://github.com/sdam-au/edh_workflow>

Total files: 80,692 
Format: Epidoc XML

##Setting up the environment
```{r}
install.packages("XML")
install.packages("dplyr")
install.packages("xml2")


library("XML")
library("methods")
library("xml2")
library("dplyr")


```


## Including Plots

Continue here https://stackoverflow.com/questions/49196674/read-multiple-xml-files-in-r-and-combine-the-data

```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
plot(pressure)
```

Note that the `echo = FALSE` parameter was added to the code chunk to prevent printing of the R code that generated the plot.
